Name: Lifferlas
Traits: False Appearance. While Lifferlas remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree. Roleplaying Information. A druid of the Emerald Enclave awakened the tree Lifferlas with a spell. Goldenfields is his home, its people his friends. Children like to carve their name and initials into his body and hang from his boughs, and he's happy with that.Ideal: "I exist to protect the people and plants of Goldenfields."Bond: "Children are wonderful. I would do anything to make them feel happy and safe."Flaw: "I can't remember people's names and often get them mixed up."
Actions: Multiattack. Lifferlas makes two slam attacks. Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
